headline: Global Agritech Market Outlook to 2030: Market to Expand Rapidly, Driven by Technological Advancements and Key Players Including Bayer AG, Corteva Agriscience, and Trimble
summary: Key market opportunities in the Global Agritech Market include the expansion of e-commerce for agricultural products, driven by rising internet access in rural areas, and increased adoption of IoT and AI technologies in farming. These advancements enhance precision agriculture, boosting productivity and sustainability.Dublin, Oct. 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Agritech Market Outlook to 2030" has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.
